author: Abdul Q
title: Smartphone sales, Realme Narzo launch delayed with new MHA order
description: Online sales of smartphones and electronics will only start after May 3rd as the MHA has clearly re-written guidelines to clarify the matter.
content: Sales of smartphones and other electronic items will remain prohibited until May 3rd, as per the latest new directive from the Ministry of Home Affairs (MHA) that came on Sunday. The new order comes after the MHA eased restriction on e-commerce portals allowi… [+1312 chars]
